attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
During the recent Job Evaluation process, the special needs Teacher's Assistants and Office Staff have been regraded, often leading to a significant reduction in pay.  We believe that the evaluation process has not taken into account the extreme dedication of these personnel, nor the skills and training that they have, including:

- Medical - eg tube feeding, trachies, medication

- Therapies - eg physical, speech, sensory

- Communication - eg Makaton, PECS, visual / hearing difficulties

- Behavioural - compassionately managing difficult behaviour

- Intimate personal care

We ask the government to give this matter their URGENT attention - these staff are hard working, committed and essential to ensure the quality of life for all disabled children.  We want them to be recognised and remunerated accordingly.
